metadata.title: USN-6889-1 -- .NET vulnerabilities
metadata.description: It was discovered that .NET did not properly handle object deserialization. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service. (CVE-2024-30105)  Radek Zikmund discovered that .NET did not properly manage memory. An attacker could use this issue to cause a denial of service or possibly execute arbitrary code. (CVE-2024-35264)  It was discovered that .NET did not properly parse X.509 Content and ObjectIdentifiers. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service. (CVE-2024-38095)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6889-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  aspnetcore-runtime-6.0 - 6.0.132-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 aspnetcore-targeting-pack-6.0 - 6.0.132-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-apphost-pack-6.0 - 6.0.132-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-host - 6.0.132-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-hostfxr-6.0 - 6.0.132-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-runtime-6.0 - 6.0.132-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-sdk-6.0 - 6.0.132-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-sdk-6.0-source-built-artifacts - 6.0.132-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-targeting-pack-6.0 - 6.0.132-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-templates-6.0 - 6.0.132-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet6 - 6.0.132-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 netstandard-targeting-pack-2.1 - 6.0.132-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 No subscription required  dotnet-sdk-8.0 - 8.0.107-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-sdk-8.0-source-built-artifacts - 8.0.107-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-sdk-dbg-8.0 - 8.0.107-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-templates-8.0 - 8.0.107-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 netstandard-targeting-pack-2.1-8.0 - 8.0.107-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 No subscription required  dotnet8 - 8.0.107-8.0.7-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 No subscription required  aspnetcore-runtime-8.0 - 8.0.7-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 aspnetcore-runtime-dbg-8.0 - 8.0.7-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 aspnetcore-targeting-pack-8.0 - 8.0.7-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-apphost-pack-8.0 - 8.0.7-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-host-8.0 - 8.0.7-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-hostfxr-8.0 - 8.0.7-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-runtime-8.0 - 8.0.7-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-runtime-dbg-8.0 - 8.0.7-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 dotnet-targeting-pack-8.0 - 8.0.7-0ubuntu1~22.04.1 No subscription required
